Text: Thanks alot, this mod really turns FF7 into a new game... Now you actually need some strategy to win and spells and summons becomes useful since enemies no longer die in 1 hit.
this mod is really hard but it also makes ff7's greatness shine even more

Really want to play this.

Seed, guise!
Come on, anybody, share, I beg of you! Wanna play, wanna play, wanna play, wanna play...
